Description: Fragment of limestone ostracon: on one side only, twenty-one incomplete lines of a text belonging to the corpus of the so-called 'Glorifications'.
Curator's comments: An incomplete transcription in J. J. Černy, Notebook 22, 4 (unpublished). For some parallels to the second half of this text, see J. Assmann, 'Journal of Egyptian Archaeology' 65 (1979), pp. 75ff. Bibliography: S. Birch, 'Inscriptions in the Hieratic and Demotic Character, from the Collections of the British Museum' (London [868), pl. XVII.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393227) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393227)
